info.title: TFG DAM API
info.description: An application that lets you create character builds for your favourite games.

templateData.description: Dynamic JSON structure depending on the game

example.name: Elden Ring
example.description: Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

data.description: Dynamic JSON structure depending on the game

example.name: Claymore
example.description:
A large sword with a long, straight blade. This heavy sword is usually wielded with two hands, but for those with enough strength, one is sufficient.

In addition to the heavy sweeping attacks, it can also make a heavy piercing thrust making this a versatile weapon.
example.shortDescription: A large sword with a long, straight blade.

post.description: Creates a new user account. Fails if username or email already exists.

201.description: The user created an account successfully

409.description: Credentials already exist on the database

example.message: Username or email already in use.

post.description: Logs a user. Fails if credentials are invalid.

200.description: User logged in successfully; tokens set in HttpOnly cookies

Set-Cookie.description: Contains access_token, refresh_token and user info as HttpOnly cookies

schema.example: access_token=ff0718d6-7f31-4638-9f59-503ef4f0f405; HttpOnly; maxAge; sameSite; Secure, refresh_token=xyz456; HttpOnly; maxAge; sameSite; Secure

post.description: Logs out the user by clearing the access_token and refresh_token cookies.

200.description: User logged out successfully; cookies cleared

Set-Cookie.description: Clears the access_token and refresh_token cookies

schema.example: access_token=ff0718d6-7f31-4638-9f59-503ef4f0f405; HttpOnly; maxAge=0; sameSite; Secure, refresh_token=xyz456; HttpOnly; maxAge=0; sameSite; Secure

post.description: Refreshes the access_token using the refresh_token stored in HttpOnly cookie.

401.description: Refresh token missing, invalid or expired

post.description: Initiates password reset process. Sends an email with a reset link if the user exists.

200.description: Password reset email sent (or request accepted)

example.message: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

post.description: Resets the user password using a token received by email.

get.description: Get a user's profile by ID. Some fields (like private builds) may be hidden depending on permissions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve

Set-Cookie.description: Clears the access_token and refresh_token cookies

schema.example: access_token=ff0718d6-7f31-4638-9f59-503ef4f0f405; HttpOnly; maxAge=0; sameSite; Secure, refresh_token=xyz456; HttpOnly; maxAge=0; sameSite; Secure

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of games. Supports optional filters by name and genre.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of games per page. Default is 15, maximum is 50.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter games by name (partial match).

parameters.name: genre
parameters.description: Filter games by one or multiple genres.

get.description: Retrieves information for a specific game using its slug

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The unique slug of the game

get.description: Retrieve paginated assets belonging to a specific game. The gameSlug parameter is required to ensure context isolation between games.

parameters.name: gameSlug
parameters.description: Slug of the game. Required to prevent cross-game results.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by asset name (partial match)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by macro type (weapon, armor, spell, etc.)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by specific category (greatsword, heavy-armor, sorcery, etc.)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by tags.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of assets per page. Default is 5, maximum is 50.

get.description: Retrieves information for a specific asset using its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the asset

get.description: Retrieve paginated builds. Supports filters by game, name, tags, and creator.

parameters.name: gameSlug
parameters.description: Slug of the game.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by build name (partial match)

parameters.name: creator
parameters.description: Filter by build creator (partial match)

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by tags.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Default is 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of builds per page. Default is 5, maximum is 50.

post.description: Create a new build. User must be authenticated.

get.description: Retrieves information for a specific build using its id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique id of the build

patch.description: Update an existing build. Supports partial updates. User must be authenticated and have permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the build to update

example.message: User does not have permission to update this build

delete.description: Deletes an existing build. User must be authenticated and have permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the build to update

example.message: User does not have permission to delete this build
